text: Jorge Ortiz Mendoza (born 25 April 1992) is a Spanish footballer who plays for Indian Super League club FC Goa as a right winger. ==Club career== Born in Villacañas, Toledo, Castile-La Mancha, Ortiz graduated from Getafe CF's youth setup, making his debut as a senior with CD Madridejos in Tercera División. In summer 2012 he moved to Albacete Balompié, starting out with the reserves also in the fourth level. On 18 January 2013, Ortiz joined fellow league club CP Villarrobledo. After featuring sparingly, he signed for Internacional de Madrid on 23 August. Ortiz joined AD Alcorcón on 21 June 2014, being assigned to the B team still in division four. His first game as a professional with the main squad took place on 24 May 2015, as he came on as a second-half substitute for Facundo Guichón in a 0–3 away loss against Real Betis for the Segunda División. On 9 July 2015, Ortiz signed with Segunda División B side CF Fuenlabrada. Roughly one year later, he returned to the second tier after agreeing to a two-year contract at Real Oviedo. Ortiz spent the next three seasons in the Spanish lower leagues, with Atlético Madrid B, Cultural y Deportiva Leonesa and CD Atlético Baleares. On 6 August 2020, he moved to the Indian Super League with FC Goa on a two-year deal as a free agent. ==References== ==External links== *Villarrobledo official profile * * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:People from the Province of Toledo Category:Spanish footballers Category:Castilian-Manchegan footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Segunda División players Category:Segunda División B players Category:Tercera División players Category:Atlético Albacete players Category:Internacional de Madrid players Category:AD Alcorcón B players Category:AD Alcorcón footballers Category:CF Fuenlabrada footballers Category:Real Oviedo players Category:Atlético Madrid B players Category:Cultural Leonesa footballers Category:CD Atlético Baleares footballers Category:Indian Super League players Category:FC Goa players Category:Spanish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in India Category:Spanish expatriate sportspeople in India
title: Jorge Ortiz Mendoza
